mapper.select: select board.board_no, board.board_cd, board.title, board.member_no, member.user_id, board.view_cnt, board.reply_cnt, board.reg_dt, board.upd_dt from tb_board board join tb_member member on board.member_no = member.member_no where board.board_cd = #{boardCd} limit #{startPage}, #{pageSize}

select board.board_no, board.title, board.content, board.member_no, member.user_id, board.view_cnt, board.reply_cnt, board.reg_dt, board.upd_dt from tb_board board join tb_member member on board.member_no = member.member_no where board.board_cd = #{boardCd} and board.board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_board(board_cd, title, member_no, content) values(#{boardCd}, #{title}, #{memberNo}, #{content})
